transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji Vijay ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Vijay ji abhi mam ka phone aaya tha isi number se main Hemant baat kar raha hu India Mart se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan mam.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan mam Hemant baat kar raha hu senior manager India Mart se mam abhi aapko maine whatsapp pe bhi message dala tha ye mera recorded line pe aap se baat kar raha hu. Mam aapne kabhi dala tha maine socha tha ki aapke product hai marble marble ball mein thik hai. To aapne bola deal karte main add kara deta hu. Baki mam ek aapka product hai mam color stones thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Color stones. To ye color stones mein hai ya fir mam kya hai ye thoda sa bataoge matlab jo alag alag stones aate hai color chote chote wo deal karte hai ya fir ye kaisa hai kya hai?
Customer: Haan usme bhi haan usme bhi deal karte hai.
Executive: Thik hai fir main isko add kara deta hu mam.
Executive: Hmm thik hai mam aur mam abhi ek cheez aur puchna tha mam ek minute. Mam maine calls ka bata diya tha mam dekho jo calls miss ho rahi hai na to iske liye aap apne is number is catalog mein panch number add kar sakte hai mam. Abhi aapka do number reh raha hai to aap ek do number aur add kar sakte hai kyuki ho sakta hai mam us panch number agar mam panch number hai.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Customer: Thik hai abhi to sir do hi rahenge abhi.
Executive: Thik hai but calling to do rahenge main aage karunga to aage kara dungi aur.
Executive: Thik hai aur mam ek cheez aur puchna chahta tha mam agar kisi buyer se agar baat hoti hai mam deal hoti hai to please review rating jarur dijiyega. Dusra mam aapke ek cheez aur feedback lena tha mujhe aapki by lead consumption mein kabhi aapne kuch by lead consume ki to uska mujhe bata do ki ha wo buyer uthate hai ya phone nahi. Jaise mam aap list vagera to banati hongi mam jo by lead consume karti hai to aapne 6 tarikh ki lead consume ki hai Lalit ji ki.
Customer: Kaise?
Executive: Lalit color stones Lalit ji the buyer ka naam tha aapne unki by lead consume ki thi. Unse kuch baat hui na mam aapki?
Customer: Haan baat hui hai whatsapp bhi kiya hai maine unko.
Executive: Thik hai unhone pucha bhi tha kyuki matlab abhi tak mam deal final nahi ki mam aapne. Quotation vagera kuch nahi diya aapne.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Thik hai baki mam ye dark green balls aapne ye natural source se ki thi. Boli shetty ji the Boli shetty naam tha Boli shetty.
Customer: Boli?
Executive: Boli shetty buyer ka naam tha mam ye aapne consume kiya tha 6 November ko. Is buyer se baat hui aapki? Unko chahiye tha dark green. Ye by lead consume kar rahe hai na unko sabko call bhi kiya ja raha hai aur whatsapp bhi kiya ja raha hai kehna kya udhar se abhi koi response nahi aaya hai.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Haan unhone abhi dekha bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Okay to please mam unko ek multiple call kar liya kare kabhi kabhi buyer response nahi karta hai but aap unko do teen bar call kar lijiyega to already aapko fir aapko response waha se mil jayega. Dusra mam abhi kuch by leads aayi hai glass balls ki aayi hai thik hai mam 37 minutes please mam koshish kariye ki 4 ghante ke andar se jyada jitni by lead de sake 4 ghante matlab usko aur kam kar do mam 2 ghante ke andar. 2 ghante ke andar jyada se jyada by lead consume kariye kyuki ek by lead ko 5 se 6 log consume karte hai mam. To agar aap late karoge mam to aapko pehle.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Agar aap late karoge na to already kai log usko consume kar lenge to fir uski uski vajah se mam is response nahi aata kyuki buyer abhi already irritated ho jata hai mam kisko kisko ek hi cheez batayega. To please koshish kiya kare ki pehle whatsapp pe kare turant kar de mam aur koi issue mam abhi tak to mam aapne account manager ke liye bola tha main bola na ki abhi aap pareshan na hoiye aap use kariye main khud isko handle karwa raha hu koi dikkat nahi aayegi aapko mam thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mam aur mam aapko maine whatsapp number bhi de diya maine apna number bhi dal diya koi bhi dikkat aati hai mam direct aap is number pe call message kariyega thik hai mam. To mam yaha se main abhi concern aapka close karunga to aapki mail id pe hamare liye feedback jayega ki aapka jo concern tha India Mart se resolve ho gaya hai. To ye Vijay sir ka mail id hai mam isse hi ek feedback jayega to mam please apna feedback hame jarur dijiyega mam thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aur koi mam doubt satisfied ho mam solution se satisfied ho mam isme koi doubt aapko?
Customer: Ho gaya sir ho gaya sir.
Executive: Thik hai aur mam yaha pe na out of stock kuch product hai mam. Haan main bata deta hu yaha pe mam aapka table show ho gaya paper weight ho gaya thik hai aur glass paper weight ho gaya ye products aapke inactive mein pade hai. To please mam isko hata dijiyega agar aap deal nahi karte hai to aap isko hata dijiyega.
Customer: Kis ko hatana hai sir?
Executive: Main bata main aapko ek list bhej de raha hu jitne bhi mam red mein product dikh rahe hai na agar aap unko deal nahi karte mam ek minute wait kariye mam.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Hata denge.
Executive: WhatsApp WhatsApp check karna WhatsApp check karo.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Dikh raha hai mam ji?
Customer: Haan mam dikh raha hai WhatsApp.
Customer: Haan sir maine check kiya WhatsApp.
Executive: Haan ye aap isme deal karte ho ye ye deal nahi karte ho.
Customer: Nahi karte.
Executive: To isko mam please delete kar dijiyega apne catalog se hata dijiyega mam thik hai?
Customer: Haan wo catalog mein apne aap hi automatic show kara rahe hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi automatic show nahi kar raha wo out of stock hai mam usko out of stock ko delete karna padta hai jab aap delete kar doge to nahi dikhega mam.
Customer: Thik hai delete kar dungi mam.
Executive: Thik hai agar aapko delete karne ka hoga to please aap ek bar main aapko guide kar deta hu abhi agar aapko karna hai ya fir aap jab bhi chahegi fir se aapko main bol dunga wo aapko guide kar denge thik hai mam?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur koi doubt mam abhi iske apart aur?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Thik hai mam please mam abhi mail pe aapko feedback jayega please apna feedback jarur share kariyega thik hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai thank you mam.
Customer: Thank you sir nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to remove out-of-stock products.

- Customer is not receiving responses from buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on removing out-of-stock products.

- Executive suggested calling buyers multiple times.

- Executive assured resolution for account manager request.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- out of stock, by leads, feedback, catalog
